summary: 2017 F250 FIRST DEATH WOBBLE AT 40,000 MILES, NOW 53,000 MILES AND EXPERIENCE DEATH WOBBLE DAILY.   DAILY DRIVER, PRAY TO GOD FORD CORRECTS BEFORE SOMEONE DIES! VERY SERIOUS SAFETY ISSUE. AT HIGHWAY SPEED DEATH WOBBLE FORCES YOU TO SLOW TO BELOW 40 MPH TO STOP, NOW YOU HAVE BECOME A ROLLING ROAD BLOCK TO BE REAR ENDED.
